participant_abstract.sent: The aim of this first "kick-off" meeting was to give the team members a chance to get to know each other, become familiar with the whiteboard and microphones, and discuss the project.
My role was to make sure that the meeting kept to its time frame and agenda.
I also tried to generate some enthusiasm for the project and a friendly atmosphere.
